gui.main.listeners
Class DisplayPatientSearchListener

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      gui.main.listeners.DisplayPatientSearchListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener
public class DisplayPatientSearchListener
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter

Waits for mouse clicks on patients in appointment confirmation table. If a patient is double clicked, a pop up window displays more information about that patient and his/her appointment.

Constructor Summary
DisplayPatientSearchListener(javax.swing.JTable owner, java.awt.Component parent, MainWindow main)
          Constructor.
 
Method Summary
 void mouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
          Looks for click events in order to display the pop up window with more patient and appointment information and to change the button label depending on whether the appointment is confirmed or unconfirmed.
 
Methods inherited from class java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
mouseDragged, mouseEntered, mouseExited, mouseMoved, mousePressed, mouseReleased, mouseWheelMoved
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
